meanings.definition: A picture made using a camera, in which an image is focused onto light-sensitive material and then made visible and permanent by chemical treatment.
meanings.sent1: I have a photograph of my family on the wall.
meanings.sent2: She keeps a photograph of her dog in her wallet.
meanings.sent3: The photograph of the cat wearing sunglasses always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: His words painted a vivid photograph of the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The photograph of the sunset was so beautiful it felt like a dream.

meanings.definition: To take a photograph of (someone or something).
meanings.sent1: I will photograph the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: He likes to photograph nature during his hikes.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally photographed my own shadow instead of the sunset.
meanings.sent4: Her memory captured the moment like a photograph.
meanings.sent5: The artist's words were able to photograph the scene in my mind.
